channel.title: FastAPI on Vassilis Sioros

item.title: Building a REST API
item.description: Heart disease is like the uninvited guest that crashes the party, causing 17.9 million deaths every year—about 31% of all deaths worldwide, with many victims under 70. But what if we could predict when this party crasher is coming? That’s where machine learning steps in, superhero-style! These models act like crystal balls for your health, scanning data for warning signs like high blood pressure or cholesterol to predict who’s at risk of heart disease.
